property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Remove All Tech Tokens At End Of Turn
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Kamikaze Suicide Attacks Done By Current Territory Owner
Kamikaze Suicide Attacks Only Where Battles Are
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Airborne Attacks Only In Existing Battles
Airborne Attacks Only In Enemy Territories
Unplaced units live when not placed
On Entering Units Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Force AA Attacks For Last Step Of Fly Over
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Submarines Defending May Submerge Or Retreat
Subs Can End NonCombat Move With Enemies
Naval Units May Not NonCombat Move Into Controlled Sea Zones
Convoy Blockades Roll Dice For Cost
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Abandoned Territories May Be Taken Over Immediately
Battles May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
A Song of Ice and Fire

Version 1.0

Created by: Kor438
Updated by: Redrum
Map image by: Astrogator87

Victory Conditions

Total Victory - 15 Victory Cities
Honorable Surrender - 12 Victory Cities
Projection of Power - 9 Victory Cities

Technology

Arms and Tactics

  • Heavy Armor (HA): All infantry and cavalry except Peasants, Slaves, Direwolves, and Mammoths get +1 defense.
  • Improved Infantry Training (IT): Cost reduced by about 1/4 for all infantry.
  • Longbows (LB): Archers, HorseArchers, and Wildlings get +1 attack.
  • Valyrian Steel (VS): Knights and other upper-tier infantry and cavalry (usually base attack 3 or better) get +1 attack.
  • Volley Fire (VF): Archers and HorseArchers give +1 support on defense.

Engineering and Infrastructure

  • Advanced Fortification (AF): Walls give +1 defense to one defending infantry or artillery; Castles give +1 defense to up to three.
  • Grapeshot (GS): Catapults and Trebuchets roll twice for attack and defense.
  • Smithies (SM): Castles get +2 production in territories with value 3 or higher.
  • War Bonds (WB): Gain 1-12 extra PUs per turn.

Naval

  • Carrack Construction (CC): Allows production of Carracks; allows Dothraki to produce Galleys instead (at normal cost, even with Shipyards).
  • Improved Rigging (IR): All ships except Rafts get +1 movement.
  • Reinforced Hulls (RH): All ships except Rafts get +1 defense.
  • Shipyards (SY): Rafts' cost reduced by 1; all other ships' costs except Carracks reduced by 2; Dothraki can build Cogs (at normal cost).
  • Wildfire (WF): All ships except Rafts get +1 attack, and Galleys and Longships can bombard.

Common Units

Structures
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Castle 0 5 0 20 Allows production of other units; Immobile; Capturable; -2 attack for up to five opposing infantry or cavalry; (AF: +1 defense to up to three infantry or artillery)
Wall 0 0 0 1 Doesn't require Castle; Max build 1/territory/turn; Immobile; Capturable; -2 attack for up to three opposing infantry or cavalry; (AF: +1 defense to one infantry or artillery)
Infantry
All infantry except Wights gain +1 defense in forest and hills terrain.
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Peasant 1 1 1 2 Cannot be purchased; 1 generated per 4 territories controlled (IT: 1 per 3 territories)
Sellsword 3 3
(HA:+1)		 1 3
(IT:2)		 2 Supportable
Archer 2
(LB:+1)		 4
(HA:+1)		 1 4
(IT:3)		 2 Additional +1 defense in hills terrain; Supports one unit on offense; (VF: Supports one unit on defense)
Cavalry
All cavalry except Others lose -1 attack in forest and hills terrain and cannot blitz in either.
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Knight 6
(VS:+1)		 6
(HA:+1)		 2 6 3 Can blitz
Artillery
All artillery gain +1 defense in hills terrain and +3 offense when attacking Castles.
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Catapult 3 6 1 6 3 Supports two units on offense; (GS:2 rolls for attack/defense)
Trebuchet 4 4 1 8 3 Supports three units on offense; (GS:2 rolls for attack/defense)
Sea
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Raft 0 1 1 3
(SY:2)		 Transport capacity 3
Cog 1
(WF:+1)		 2
(RH:+1)		 2
(IR:+1)		 8
(SY:6)		 Transport capacity 5
Galley 5
(WF:+1)		 5
(RH:+1)		 2
(IR:+1)		 10
(SY:8)		 (WF:Can bombard)
Carrack 7
(WF:+1)		 7
(RH:+1)		 2
(IR:+1)		 18 Two hits to kill; Can bombard; Requires Carrack Construction tech

Players

Night's Watch

At war with Dothraki and Free Folk. Open Borders with Stark. Ceasefire with rest.
Infantry
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Northman 4
(VS:+1)		 4
(HA:+1)		 1 2 Supportable
Cavalry
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Direwolf 7 6 2 3 Two hits to kill
Begins with two Northmen and one Direwolf, but cannot produce more.

Objectives:

  • +5 - The Wall:
    Control The Wall

Targaryen

Open Borders with Martell. Ceasefire with Greyjoy, Night's Watch, and Tyrell. At war with rest.
Infantry
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Unsullied 6
(VS:+1)		 6
(HA:+1)		 1 5
(IT:4)		 2
Cavalry
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Kingsguard 6
(VS:+1)		 6
(HA:+1)		 2 3 Can blitz; Two hits to kill
Air
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Dragon 10 7 4
(DG:+1)		 Two hits to kill; (DG:2 rolls for attack)
Cannot produce Catapults or Trebuchets. Begins with one Knight, one Kingsguard, and three Dragons, but cannot produce more.
Cannot gain Grapeshot technology; instead gets Dragon Growth (DG): Dragons get +1 movement and roll twice for attack.

Objectives:

  • +1 each - Slaver's Bay:
    1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
  • +5 - A Foothold in Westeros:
    Control any territory on mainland Westeros

Greyjoy

Ceasefire with Free Cities, Night's Watch, and Targaryen. At war with rest.
Infantry
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Iron Raider 4 2
(HA:+1)		 1 3
(IT:2)		 2 +1 amphibious attack
Sea
Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
Longship 6
(WF:+1)		 5
(RH:+1)		 2
(IR:+1)		 10
(SY:8)		 Supportable; (WF:Can bombard)
Greatship 8
(WF:+1)		 7
(RH:+1)		 2
(IR:+1)		 14
(SY:12)		 Supports one unit on offense; Can bombard; Transport capacity 3
Cannot produce Galleys.

Objectives:

  • +1 each - The Iron Islands:
    1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
  • +3 - Secure Ironman's Bay:
    Control Faircastle and all of the Iron Islands (Blacktyde, Great Wyk, Old Wyk, Orkmont, Harlaw, Saltcliffe, and Pyke) and no enemy ships in adjacent sea zones (The Iron Islands Sea Zone, Ironman's Bay Sea Zone, and Gold Coast Sea Zone)
  • +4 - Raid the Riverlands:
    Control 3 in 5 of Cape of Eagles, The Twins, Seagard, Fairmarket, and Raventree Hall
  • +4 - Raid the Westerlands:
    Control 3 in 5 of Banefort, The Crag, Ashemark, Sarsfield, and Kayce
  • +4 - Raid the North:
    Control 4 in 10 of Cape Kraken, Flint's Finger, Whispering Wood, Barrowton, The Rills, Sea Dragon Point, Stony Shore, Deepwood Motte, Mountain Clans, and Bear Island
  • +4 - Rule the Sunset Sea:
    • Control all of The Shield Islands and The Arbor; and no enemy ships between Lannisport and The Arbor (South Sunset Sea Zone, The Shield Islands Sea Zone, Redwyne Straits Sea Zone, and Whispering Sound Sea Zone)

    Free Folk

    At war with all other players.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Wildling 3
    (LB:+1)
    (VS:+1)    		 4
    (HA:+1)    		 1 4
    (IT:3)    		 2 Supportable
    Giant 7 6
    (HA:+1)    		 1 5 Supportable; Two hits to kill
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Mammoth 5 8 2 5 Two hits to kill
    Cannot produce Knights or Sellswords. Begins with four Giants and three Mammoths, but cannot produce more.
    Increased tech cost (7 instead of 5).

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - Beyond the Wall:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +10 - Over the Wall:
      10 PUs, 3 Tech Tokens, and add capital to The Gift the first time The Gift is conquered or the Night's Watch is allied
    • +5 - Out of the North:
      No mobile land units north of The Wall

    Dothraki

    At war with all other players.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Slave 0 1 1 2 Cannot be purchased; 1 generated per 4 territories controlled (IT: 1 per 3 territories)
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Horse Archer 2
    (LB:+1)
    (WT:+1)    		 5
    (HA:+1)    		 2
    (WT:+1)    		 4 3 +1 defense in hills terrain; (VF: Supports one unit on defense); (WT:Can blitz)
    Horse Lord 4
    (VS:+1)
    (WT:+1)    		 3
    (HA:+1)    		 3 4 3 (WT:Can blitz)
    Bloodrider 6
    (VS:+1)
    (WT:+1)    		 6
    (HA:+1)    		 2
    (WT:+1)    		 7 2 Supportable; Can blitz
    Khal 7
    (VS:+1)
    (WT:+1)    		 7
    (HA:+1)    		 2
    (WT:+1)    		 9 2 Supports three units on offense; Can blitz
    Cannot produce common units other than Castles, Rafts, and Walls; produces Slaves instead of Peasants. (Shipyards allow production of Cogs; Carrack Construction allows production of Galleys instead of Carracks.)
    Cannot gain Grapeshot technology; instead gets Westerosi Tack (WT): Cavalry get +1 attack, movement 3, and can blitz.
    Increased tech cost (10 instead of 5).

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Dothraki Sea:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +4 - Conquer the north:
      Control all of Saath, Vaes Graddakh, Omber, Vaes Athjikhari, Vaes Leqse, Vaes Leisi, New Ibbish, and Ibbish
    • +3 - Conquer the south:
      Control all of Vaes Efe, Vaes Mejhah, Krazaaj Has, Kosrak, Hesh, and Lhazosh
    • +5 and +1 Tech Token each - Loot Essos:
      5 PUs and 2 Tech Tokens the first time each major (circled) city on mainland Essos is conquered (Qohor, Norvos, Braavos, Pentos, Myr, Volantis, Meereen, Yunkai, Astapor, and Qarth)

    Arryn

    At war with Dothraki, Free Folk, Greyjoy, and Targaryen. Ceasefire with rest.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Mountain Clansman 4 2
    (HA:+1)    		 1 3
    (IT:2)    		 2 +1 attack in hills terrain

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Vale of Arryn:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled

    Tully

    Allied with Stark. Ceasefire with Arryn, Free Cities, Martell, Night's Watch, and Tyrell. At war with rest.
    No special units.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Riverlands:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +4 - A foothold in the Iron Isles:
      Control 1 in 7 of Blacktyde, Great Wyk, Old Wyk, Orkmont, Harlaw, Saltcliffe, and Pyke

    Martell

    Open Borders with Targaryen. At war with Dothraki, Free Folk, Greyjoy, and Tyrell. Ceasefire with rest.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Spearman 4
    (VS:+1)    		 3
    (HA:+1)    		 1 4
    (IT:3)    		 2 Supportable
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Horse Archer 2
    (LB:+1)    		 5
    (HA:+1)    		 2 4 3 +1 defense in hills terrain; (VF: Supports one unit on defense)
    Sea
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Greenblood Boat 1
    (WF:+1)    		 2
    (RH:+1)    		 3
    (IR:+1)    		 8
    (SY:6)    		 Transport capacity 5
    Cannot produce Cogs, Knights, or Sellswords.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - Dorne:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +4 - Rule the Sea of Dorne:
      No enemy ships in Sea of Dorne Sea Zone; and control all adjacent land territories (Weeping Tower, Stonehelm, Wyl, Yronwood, The Tor, and Ghost Hill)
    • +3 - Conquer the Stepstones:
      Control 4 in 5 of Greenstone, Tyrosh, Bloodstone, The Stepstones, and Lys; and no enemy ships in The Stepstones Sea Zone
    • +3 - The Mountain that Rides:
      Lannister does not control a Giant

    Baratheon

    Open Borders with Tyrell. Ceasefire with Arryn, Free Cities, Martell, and Night's Watch. At war with rest.
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Kingsguard 6
    (VS:+1)    		 6
    (HA:+1)    		 2 12 3 Can blitz; Two hits to kill; Can't control more than 7; Can only be built in King's Landing
    Begins with three Kingsguard, but cannot produce more unless King's Landing is captured.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Stormlands:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +3 - A Trueborn King:
      Control King's Landing
    • +3 - Secure Blackwater Bay:
      No enemy ships in The Gullet Sea Zone or Blackwater Bay Sea Zone; and allies control all adjacent land territories (Crackclaw Point, Rook's Rest, Duskendale, Rosby, King's Landing, South Crownlands, Stonedance, Driftmark, Dragonstone)

    Stark

    Allied with Tully. Open Borders with Night's Watch. Ceasefire with Arryn, Free Cities, Martell, and Tyrell. At war with rest.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Mountain Clansman 4 2
    (HA:+1)    		 1 2 +1 attack in hills terrain
    Northman 4
    (VS:+1)    		 4
    (HA:+1)    		 1 4
    (IT:3)    		 2 Supportable
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Direwolf 7 6 2 3 Two hits to kill
    Begins with five Direwolves and six Mountain Clansmen, but cannot produce more.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The North:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled

    Tyrell

    Open Borders with Baratheon and Lannister. At war with Dothraki, Free Folk, Greyjoy, and Martell. Ceasefire with rest.
    No special units.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Reach:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +5 - A Queen in King's Landing:
      Allies control King's Landing

    Lannister

    Open Borders with Tyrell. Ceasefire with Arryn, Free Cities, Martell, and Night's Watch. At war with rest.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Goldcloak 3 3
    (HA:+1)    		 1 2.5
    (IT:1.67)    		 2 Supportable
    Giant 7 6
    (HA:+1)    		 1 5 Supportable; Two hits to kill
    Cavalry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Kingsguard 6
    (VS:+1)    		 6
    (HA:+1)    		 2 12 3 Can blitz; Two hits to kill; Can't control more than 7; Can only be built in King's Landing
    Cannot produce Sellswords. Begins with one Giant, but cannot produce more.

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Westerlands:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +3 - Conquer the Riverlands:
      Control all of Raventree Hall, Riverrun, Pinkmaiden, and Stoney Sept
    • +3 - Subdue the Reach:
      Allies control all of Old Oak, Red Lake, Golden Grove, and Standfast
    • +2 - Rule in King's Landing:
      Control King's Landing

    Free Cities

    At war with Dothraki, Free Folk, and Targaryen. Ceasefire with rest.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Slave 0 1 1 2 Cannot be purchased; 1 generated per 4 territories controlled (IT: 1 per 3 territories)
    Water Dancer 5
    (VS:+1)    		 5
    (HA:+1)    		 1 6
    (IT:4)    		 2 Supportable
    Unsullied 6
    (VS:+1)    		 6
    (HA:+1)    		 1 2
    Faceless Man 6
    (VS:+1)    		 4
    (HA:+1)    		 1 16
    (IT:12)    		 2 Supportable; Two hits to kill
    Cannot produce Knights; produces Slaves instead of Peasants. Begins with six Unsullied, but cannot produce more.
    Cost of all common units increased by 1 PU.
    Increased tech cost (7 instead of 5).

    Objectives:

    • +1 each - The Free Cities:
      1 PU for each originally-owned territory still controlled
    • +3 - The Iron Bank:
      Research tech War Bonds
    • +3 - Control the Narrow Sea:
      No enemy ships adjacent to the east coast of the Narrow Sea between Braavos and Lys (Waters of Braavos Sea Zone, Longbow Rapids Sea Zone, North Narrow Sea Zone, South Narrow Sea Zone, Sea of Myrth Sea Zone, The Stepstones Sea Zone)

    Others

    At war with all other players.
    Infantry
    Image Name Att Def Move Cost Size Special
    Wight 4 4 1 No bonuses for terrain or fortification
    Cavalry
    Other 8 8 2 Can blitz; Two hits to kill; Generates 1 Wight each turn; No penalties for terrain
    No tech or objectives and cannot purchase units. Units automatically generated in The Frostfangs.

    Map image by: Astrogator87 at https://www.deviantart.com/astrogator87/art/Map-of-Westeros-Essos-and-parts-of-Sothoros-288550923
